DOC.brief_summary: Transfusion of washed intra-operative cell salvage post-operatively in the PCICU can be performed safely without increased risk of bleeding or release of inflammatory mediators. This will reduce the need for allogeneic blood products as well as crystalloid and colloid infusions and thus decrease the length of ventilation and intensive care duration for these infants.
DOC.brief_title: Use of Cell Salvage Post-operatively in Infants to Decrease Use of Allogeneic Blood Product Transfusions
DOC.criteria: 1. Weight < or = 20Kg; 2. Cardiac surgery with CPB at URMC; 3. informed consent 1. weight > 21 Kg; inability to obtain consent; nonEnglish speaking
